title: Trump Moves to Make Data Centers Pay for Surging Power Costs
description: President Donald Trump and US Northeast governors will direct the nation’s largest grid operator to hold an emergency power auction that would force technology giants to pay for the construction of a fleet of new plants.
content: President Donald Trump and US Northeast governors will direct the nation’s largest grid operator to hold an emergency power auction that would force technology giants to pay for the construction of a fleet of new plants.
